analysis.description:
ZiberToken.refund (/unique_chucks/35/0xe15422570cb3cd88bd7ef87f14c6ca7c43f77398.sol#155-163) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(weiValue) (/unique_chucks/35/0xe15422570cb3cd88bd7ef87f14c6ca7c43f77398.sol#162-163)

ZiberToken (/unique_chucks/35/0xe15422570cb3cd88bd7ef87f14c6ca7c43f77398.sol#21-306) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/35/0xe15422570cb3cd88bd7ef87f14c6ca7c43f77398.sol#163-176)

ZiberToken.refund (/unique_chucks/35/0xe15422570cb3cd88bd7ef87f14c6ca7c43f77398.sol#155-163) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- weiValue == 0
weiRefunded in ZiberToken.refund (/unique_chucks/35/0xe15422570cb3cd88bd7ef87f14c6ca7c43f77398.sol#160-161) is a local variable never initialiazed

Reentrancy in ZiberToken.claim_bounty (/unique_chucks/35/0xe15422570cb3cd88bd7ef87f14c6ca7c43f77398.sol#229-261):
	External calls:
	- token.proxyPayment.value(this.balance - bounty)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/35/0xe15422570cb3cd88bd7ef87f14c6ca7c43f77398.sol#244-245)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- time_bought (/unique_chucks/35/0xe15422570cb3cd88bd7ef87f14c6ca7c43f77398.sol#253-257)

DaoToken.CAP should be constant (/unique_chucks/35/0xe15422570cb3cd88bd7ef87f14c6ca7c43f77398.sol#15-16)
DaoToken.totalEthers should be constant (/unique_chucks/35/0xe15422570cb3cd88bd7ef87f14c6ca7c43f77398.sol#16-17)
